taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Eragrostis pectinacea var. tracyi (Hitchc.) P.M. Peterson

bio:treatment.description: Pedicels divergent, usually diverging 20-70Â° from the branches. Anthers 0.5-0.7 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Eragrostis pectinacea var. tracyi is known from only Lee, Mantee, and Sarasota counties, Florida. It flowers from March-May and August-December in the Flora region.
